titleInfo.title: Enabling Longitudinal Data Comparison Using DDI

mods.abstract: This paper is part of a series that focuses on DDI usage and how the metadata specification should be applied in a variety of settings by a variety of organizations and individuals. Support for this working paper series was provided by the authorsâ€™ home institutions; by GESIS - Leibniz Institute for the Social Sciences; by Schloss Dagstuhl - Leibniz Center for Informatics; and by the DDI Alliance.
